column4: !pdf | ThePub not sure what the features are of each but here are a few pdf readers:
readers are just that, readers.  they don't offer any sort of annotation.
ever use full acrobat on Windows or Mac that has annotation support?  It's pretty nifty, lets you markup a PDF with notes, etc then print those off.
sorry, never needed them and i can't stand adobe software (you could try using it in wine or a windows vm)
